customer_addr:
2203 Italy Friend Rd
Penn Yan, NY 14527

citations.narrative:
Currently closed bags of food are stacked in the main kennel area next to miscellaneous items and cleaning supplies.
One bag was broken at the corner and food was on the floor from a dog getting a hold of the bag. Only food that is in
current use may be stored in the main kennel and once the bags are opened, the food must be stored in leakproof
containers to protect the food supplies from potential contamination. This food needs to be moved to another area for
proper storage.
Correct by: April 14, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:

Housing facilities, general. 
Currently closed bags of food are stacked in the main kennel area next to miscellaneous items and cleaning supplies. 
One bag was broken at the corner and food was on the floor from a dog getting a hold of the bag. Only food that is in 
current use may be stored in the main kennel and once the bags are opened, the food must be stored in leakproof 
containers to protect the food supplies from potential contamination. This food needs to be moved to another area for 
proper storage. 
 
Correct by: April 14, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
